posts.post_title: Need t204s for set completion - Tinker, Wallace, Cicotte, Huggins, Bresnahan & Plank
posts.post_content:
Lowergrade if possible....willing to buy or trade and have plenty to offer in return!  Beaters and trimmed cards are fine.  Thanks in advance!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
Still looking....can anyone help with this group?  Thanks all!

Still looking....am very close to completing the entire set as I'm down to just a few t204 HOFers remaining.  Plenty to trade or would make a cash offer.  Here are the 13 I'm needing still - 
Bresnahan, Burkett, Cicotte, E. Collins, J. Collins, Evers, Griffith, Huggins, Johnson, Keeler, Plank, Tinker, Wallace


Let me know if you can help me out!  Thanks!

Brian
